a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Share of informal employment in agriculture by sex
Share of employment in agriculture, forestry, and fishing, which is informal. Workers in informal employment
lack job security, benefits, and protection.
Note: Informal employment refers to paid or unpaid work not recognized or protected by legal or regulatory systems. Subsistence farmers are
